1.3 Introducing ggplot
For more details, visit ggplot2.
Small cheatsheet



ggplot2



1.3.1 R Graphics VS ggplot
Plotting a simple bar chart

R Graphicsggplot2



hist(exam_data$MATHS, ylab='Number of students', xlab='score', main='Distribution of Math scores')







ggplot(data = exam_data,
       aes(x=RACE)) + 
  geom_bar()
